Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Bleed air leak detection. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 09/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
